tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE credit_score_changes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  credit_score INT,
  change_date TIMESTAMP,
  reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE credit_score_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    old_score INT,
    new_score INT,
    change_log TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    email VARCHAR(50)
);
